body.name: xigua Cute Rabbit Face Water Bottle with Straw Lid Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Thermo Flask for Sports Cycling Hiking School Home,20 oz.
features: 【🍺MATERIAL & SIZE】: This water bottle is made of food grade 18/8 STAINLESS STEEL which is unbreakable and durable,stain,odor resistant,never rust and no-metal flavor. It can be completely removed and washed,which is very convenient. It does not contain BPA and does not emit peculiar smell, sweat and rust. The 20/32oz tumbler is the perfect size for everyday use and most Car Cupholders Friendly.

【🍺VACUUM INSULATION WATER BOTTLE】:Double-walled Vacuum Insulated stainless steel body and purely stretch-formed copper lining ensure that it be good at temperature protection.The tight-fit lid help maintain your drink at the right temperature for hours,much longer than typical ceramic ones.Under normal temperature,the insulated tumbler was tested to guarantee its high vacuum degree to keep your drinks hot for 10 hours and cold for 24 hours to ensure your Every bite is fresh and refreshing.

【🍺LEAKPROOF STRAW LID】: Built for easy drinking on the go out,the lid is leak proof when the nozzle is in the closed position.The cup is easy to take with you no matter where you go and the straw top means no risk of spillage.The bottle cap is equipped with a vent valve,when you open it when you want to drink water, you can quickly lower the temperature,and you don’t have to worry about burning your mouth if the water is too hot.Drinking water is very convenient.

【🍺UNIQUE DESIGN】: The outer water bottle uses unique and fashionable DIY patterns design,beautiful and interesting.keeping the colorful appearance,it makes your bottle stand out with different elegance.The unique thermos bottle charm will attract the attention of others when it is used in the gym, office,travel and school.

【🍺A WONDERFUL GIFT】: For those who love outdoor activities such as boating, hiking and camping, the sturdy, portable and heat-retaining tumbler can definately meet your needs. For those who spend lots of time commuting to the office, it allows you take your time drinking your morning brew on the go. For those who enjoy BBQs, birthday parties and festival celebrations, it is a stylish and practical gift prepared for you and your family!
body.description: SPECIFICATIONMaterial:Food-grade 304 stainless steel material + food-grade PP + food-grade siliconeSize:600 ml --10.8*2.8 inch/27.5*7.2cm1000 ml --13.38*3.3 inch/34*8.5 cmFeature:Ultra durable,BPA-free,easy to clean,non-fading,non-slip,heat resistant,portable,heat preservation,washable,reusable,odor resistant,never rust and no-metal flavor. VACUUM STAINLESS STEEL TUMBLEROur water bottle is made of high-quality 304 material,BPA-free,high temperature resistant,environmentally friendly,and will not cause harm to the human body. The stainless steel tube has good heat preservation performance. EASY TO USEEasy one handed drinking and Easy grip to grab. The widened handle design can be easily lifted with two fingers,making it more portable. Due to its vacuum insulated design,no matter how cold or hot inside,the exterior is SWEAT FREE and pleasant to hold. The bottle cap is equipped with a vent valve,it can quickly lower the temperature. APPLICABLE OCCASIONSThis water bottle is specially designed for your outdoor sports. They are very suitable for camping,hiking,rock climbing and other outdoor activities. You can use it in offices,gyms,swimming pools and it is also a great choice for gifting. TIPS 1. Please do not freeze or microwave.2. Hand wash the tumbler before first use and after each use. A clear straw attaches to the bottom of the lid and can be easily removed for cleaning.3. After pouring in boiling water,let it cool down without the lid for at least 3 minutes.4. Please leave some space at top of vessel for lid to avoid overflow.5. Always keep the tumbler away from children when filled with hot liquid.
